mapper.select: SELECT APPRAISAL_PLAN.FINAL_SCORE score, "ORGANIZATION"."NAME" departmentName FROM APPRAISAL_PLAN LEFT JOIN "ORGANIZATION" ON "ORGANIZATION". ID = APPRAISAL_PLAN.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE APPRAISAL_PLAN."TYPE" = 0 AND APPRAISAL_PLAN.OBJECT_TYPE = 0 AND APPRAISAL_PLAN."MONTH" = #{month,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND APPRAISAL_PLAN."YEAR" = #{year,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND APPRAISAL_PLAN.AMPUTATED = 0 ORDER BY APPRAISAL_PLAN.FINAL_SCORE DESC,NLSSORT("ORGANIZATION"."NAME", 'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')
